Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: front page of the Docktown Daily \& Newtown Knicknacker

The first page of The Daily. It says: "The Ballad of Captain Rannos
Greetings One \& All of Triskellian! Seems I've been lacking in reporting the news. Well here it is for you - a bit of news that seemed to be floating about as of late. Mayhap it will solve our pirate problem to some degree!
My name's Cap'n Rannos when I sail when I sail Me name's Cap'n Rannos when I sail.
Best afear of old Rannos and the seas I sail across oh me gain will be your loss when I sail.
Tried to put me in the noose Oh they put me in the noose They put me in the noose But the devil I seduced Made the bastard set me loose.
I spied ships from Chalon Oh I spied ships from Chalon I spied ships from Chalon And with my wit and my brawn took the ships and all upon.
I spied ships from the west and they tried to make arrest Didn't go like they'd assessed.
I Spied some ships from bruges snuck aboard and lit some fuses and I blew apart the losers.
I blocked Triskellian port set aflame the whole of court made shutting down trade a sport.
I've had my share of booty and though some might think it's fruity Black Pete really was a cutie.
-- Infamous M.C"

The Ballad of Captain Rannos
Greetings One \& All of Triskellian! Seems I've been lacking in reporting the news. Well here it is for you - a bit of news that seemed to be floating about as of late. Mayhap it will solve our pirate problem to some degree!
My name's Cap'n Rannos when I sail when I sail Me name's Cap'n Rannos when I sail.
Best afear of old Rannos and the seas I sail across oh me gain will be your loss when I sail.
Tried to put me in the noose Oh they put me in the noose They put me in the noose But the devil I seduced Made the bastard set me loose.
I spied ships from Chalon Oh I spied ships from Chalon I spied ships from Chalon And with my wit and my brawn took the ships and all upon.
I spied ships from the west and they tried to make arrest Didn't go like they'd assessed.
I Spied some ships from bruges snuck aboard and lit some fuses and I blew apart the losers.
I blocked Triskellian port set aflame the whole of court made shutting down trade a sport.
I've had my share of booty and though some might think it's fruity Black Pete really was a cutie.
-- Infamous M.C
